answers.author: Jared Dailey
answers.text:
Mr. Townsend -- Stinson has been recognized under the council-manager criteria since 1967.  The Directory of ICMA Recognized Local Government records all the recognitions and can be viewed at http://webapps.icma.org/WhosWho/index.cfm?fuseaction=R.


Mr. Townsend -- Stinson has been recognized under the council-manager criteria since 1967.  The Directory of ICMA Recognized Local Government records all the recognitions and can be viewed at http://webapps.icma.org/WhosWho/index.cfm?fuseaction=R.

author: R. Townsend
text:
Is the City of Sinton, Texas a recognized city manager city? If not, please send me information as to what ICMA needs to recognize Sinton. 
Sinton is a home rule city with 6625 population with the position of city manager established in the Charter'.
Thanks.
There is no urgency re this request.
title: Is Sinton recognized as a city manager city?
